item.title: Fatal Fury: City of the Wolves adds Kain R. Heinlein; DLC characters Andy Bogard, Joe Higashi, and Mr. Big announced
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/02/fatal-fury-city-of-the-wolves-adds-kain-r-heinlein-dlc-characters-andy-bogard-joe-higashi-and-mr-big-announced

  • PC
  • PS4
  • PS5
  • Xbox Series

Kain R. Heinlein playable in the open beta test.

Kain R. Heinlein will be a playable character in Fatal Fury: City of the Wolves, and Andy Bogard, Joe Higashi, and Mr. Big will join Ken and Chun-Li from Street Fighter as downloadable content characters for Season Pass 1, SNK announced.

Get the latest details below.

Arriving in South Town: Five Season Pass 1 Downloadable Content Characters

Street Fighter‘s Ken and Chun-Li, Fatal Fury‘s Andy Bogard and Joe Higashi, and Art of Fighting‘s Mr. Big will take to the streets of South Town throughout 2025 and 2026. Each downloadable content character will be available as part of the Fatal Fury: City of the Wolves Special Edition, which includes the base game for $59.99 USD on all platforms. Fans who pre-order will also receive the iconic Fatal Fury 2 costume for Terry Bogard.

Season Pass 1 characters will release during the following windows:

  • Andy Bogard: Summer 2025
  • Ken: Summer 2025
  • Joe Higashi: Fall 2025
  • Chun-Li: Winter 2025
  • Mr. Big: Early 2026

Dominate South Town with Kain R. Heinlein

  • Voiced by Brett Calo in English, Yuichi Nakamura in Japanese
  • A young idealist burning with ambition, Kain’s domineering resolve sees him tearing through numerous hostile organizations around South Town. While cleansing the town, he makes an unsettling discovery: his older sister, Marie, is being held captive. Realizing he cannot rescue her alone, Kain allies with Rock Howard to confront her captors. With a twist of fate, a dream for the future, and an unwavering resolve, Kain turns to the upcoming KOF tournament, where he hopes to return Marie to safety once at last.

Fight Early this Month with Eight Open Beta Characters and Four Stages

Choose from eight fierce fighters in the open beta, including Kain R. Heinlein, the final boss of GAROU: Mark of the Wolves. The beta will feature four stages—Training, Freight Express, B. Port, and Training Ground—as well as online Ranked Matches, Casual Matches, and Room Matches and the offline Tutorial.

Playable characters include:

  • Kain R. Heinlein
  • Rock Howard
  • Terry Bogard
  • Hotaru Futaba
  • B. Jenet
  • Mai Shiranui
  • Preecha
  • Vox Reaper

Fatal Fury: City of the Wolves introduces a stunning, comic-inspired art style that’s a visual treat for series fans, combined with fights fueled by the cutting-edge REV System to deliver dynamic matches. The open beta offers the public their first opportunity to experience the modernized action of Fatal Fury: City of the Wolves at home, featuring two distinct control schemes tailored to engage both newcomers and seasoned pros.

Fatal Fury: City of the Wolves is due out for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, PlayStation 4, and PC via Steam and Epic Games Store on April 24.

Watch a new set of trailers below. View a new set of screenshots at the gallery.

item.title: Hunter x Hunter: Nen x Impact launches July 17, DLC character Nephelpito announced
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/02/hunter-x-hunter-nen-x-impact-launches-july-17-dlc-character-nephelpito-announced

  • PC
  • PS5
  • Switch

Pre-orders available in standard, Digital Deluxe, and physical Limited editions.

Hunter x Hunter: Nen x Impact will launch for PlayStation 5, Switch, and PC via Steam on July 17, publishers Arc System Works and Bushiroad Games, and developer Eighting announced. Digital pre-orders are available now and include 48 hours of early access to the game starting July 15 on PlayStation 5 and PC.

Additionally, the companies announced Nephelpito as the first downloadable content character of Season Pass 1, which will contain four characters. Nphelpito will launch this fall, followed by a second unannounced character in winter 2025, third in spring 2026, and fourth in summer 2026.

Pre-orders are now available in the following editions:

  • Standard Edition ($59.99)
    • Base game
  • Digital Deluxe Edition ($74.99)
    • Base game
    • Season Pass 1
    • Alternate costume (Chrollo)
  • Physical Limited Edition ($99.99)
    • Base game
    • Season Pass 1
    • Alternate costume (Chrollo)
    • Alternate costume (Kurapika)
    • Alternate costume (Hisoka)
    • Limited edition illustrated box
    • Special booklet
    • Acrylic stand

Hunter x Hunter: Nen x Impact is due out for PlayStation 5, Switch, and PC via Steam this summer.

Watch a new trailer below.

Release Date Trailer

English

Japanese

item.title: Granblue Fantasy Versus: Rising DLC characters Galleon, Wilnas, Meg, and Ilsa announced
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/02/granblue-fantasy-versus-rising-dlc-characters-galleon-wilnas-meg-and-ilsa-announced

  • PC
  • PS4
  • PS5

Character Pass Season 2 lineup revealed.

Galleon, Wilnas, Meg, and Ilsa will join Granblue Fantasy Versus: Rising alongside Sandalphon as downloadable content characters for Character Pass Season 2, publisher Cygames and developer Arc System Works announced.

Each character’s release window is as follows:

  • Sandalphon – February 26
  • Galleon – Spring 2025
  • Wilnas – Summer 2025
  • Meg – Fall 2025
  • Ilsa – Early 2026

Granblue Fantasy Versus: Rising is available now for PlayStation 5, PlayStation 4, and PC via Steam.

Watch a new trailer below.

Character Pass 2 Teaser Trailer

English

Japanese

item.title: Under Night In-Birth II Sys:Celes DLC character Ogre launches February 19 for PS5, PS4, and PC; February 26 for Switch
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/02/under-night-in-birth-ii-sysceles-dlc-character-ogre-launches-february-19-for-ps5-ps4-and-pc-february-26-for-switch

Under Night In-Birth II Sys:Celes downloadable content character Ogre will launch on February 19 at 5:00 p.m. PT / 8:00 p.m. ET for PlayStation 5, PlayStation 4, and PC, and February 26 at 5:00 p.m. PT / 8:00 p.m. ET for Switch, publisher Arc System Works and developer French-Bread announced.

Under Night In-Birth II Sys:Celes is available now for PlayStation 5, PlayStation 4, Switch, and PC via Steam.

Watch a new trailer below.

DLC Character Ogre Release Date Trailer

Japanese

item.title: Buramato – 2025 trailer
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/02/buramato-2025-trailer

  • PC
  • PS4
  • PS5
  • Switch
  • Xbox One
  • Xbox Series

Latest look at the fantasy action adventure game inspired by Bornean mythology.

Ozygames has released a new trailer for Buramato, its upcoming semi open-world 3D action adventure game with RPG elements, inspired by traditional Bornean mythology.

Here is an overview of the game, via its Steam page:

About

Buramato is a fast-paced semi open-world 3D action adventure video game with some RPG elements in which you can traverse the ancient lands of the old lords.

Explore a world inspired by traditional Bornean mythology. Slay monsters with stylish combos and discover the Old Lords’ cursed lands to unravel the secrets behind your lost memory.

Key Features

  • A Journey Filled With Unforgettable Faces – Strangers, allies, and adversaries—each with their own burdens, secrets, and desires. Some will offer guidance, others will test your resolve, and a few will stand against you. As you cross paths with these souls, their stories intertwine with your own, revealing glimpses of a past lost to the curse. Will you uncover the truth, or will their motives lead you further into the unknown?
  • Forge Your Own Path in the Enchanted Realms of Bornean Myth – Embrace the journey of a silent, amnesiac wanderer, venture into the mystical realms of the Bornean folklore. Glide, warp, and leap across lush plains, vast lakes, and floating islands as you ascend the colossal Tree of Murang. Uncover lost memories, piece together your forgotten past, and unravel the dark truth behind your cursed existence.
  • Immerse Yourself in Fast Paced, Adrenaline-fueled Combat – Battle colossal guardians, ferocious beasts, and nightmarish monsters in a relentless, fast-paced action RPG. Chain fluid combos and wield the power of Purpura Pandurata, your enigmatic fairy companion, to obliterate the looming threat.
  • Grow Your Power – Wield the power of the curse! Craft some powerful items, awaken devastating abilities, and dominate the domains. Brave the unknown, uncover long-lost secrets, and carve your path through a world steeped in mystery.
  • Bornean-Inspired World – Explore visually stunning environments influenced by traditional Bornean folklore.
  • Fluid Traversal System – Move with speed and precision across the world using long jumps, warp abilities, aerial dashes, and gliding. Upgrade your movement alongside your combat skills to unlock new ways to explore—all without a single invisible wall stopping your journey.
  • Fast-Paced Combat – Engage in dynamic battles against the embodiment of the curse, whether it’s a small monster or a massive colossal beast.
  • Expansive Lore – Discover the hidden history and untold secrets of the world through codex entries, texts, collectibles, and in-game conversations.
  • Immersive Sound and Art – A beautifully crafted aesthetic and soundtrack that bring the world to life, featuring traditional Bornean influences in both instrumentation and tone.
  • Crafting and Customization – Gather rare materials from the land and fallen enemies to forge powerful Relics and consumables that enhance your abilities and shape your playstyle. Experiment with upgrades and enhancements to carve your own path through an ever-evolving adventure, adapting to every challenge that awaits.

Buramato is in development for consoles and PC via Steam. Back in July 2024, PlayStation 5 and Switch versions were rated in Taiwan under the publishing of physical distributor Soft Source Entertainment.

Watch the trailer below.

Official Trailer 2025
